title: Applying Associative Property
text: Using the Associative Property of Multiplication, we know that the three terms can be multiplied in any order.

title: Identifying Simplifications
text: Notice that $$20$$ is a multiple of $$5$$ by a factor of $$4$$. Using this knowledge we can scale down $$20$$ in the numerator and $$5$$ in the denominator to $$\frac{4}{1}$$.

title: Simplifying the Expression
text: What is the simplified expression once fully multiplied?
